subject: Technology
title: AI in Game Design
description: A micro-lesson that makes AI in Game Design usable.

hook.text: Game enemies used to walk into walls. Now AI opponents can learn your play style and adapt in real time.

buildup.text: Early game AI followed simple scripts: patrol this path, attack when the player is near.

discovery.text: Modern AI creates dynamic worlds where characters react believably and landscapes generate themselves.

twist.text: AI can now generate entire game levels, dialogue, and artwork. Some fear it will replace human designers.

climax.text: The best games will likely blend human creativity with AI-generated content, making worlds feel infinite.

punchline.text: AI won't replace game designers. It will give them superpowers.

quiz.question: How is AI changing game design?
options: It creates adaptive enemies and generates dynamic content
It eliminates the need for game testers
